channel.title: Simplestic Development
channel.description:
[anchor=top][/anchor] [img]http://img229.imageshack.us/img229/8595/psmoe5.png[/img]
[center][size=24pt]Table Of Contents[/size][/center] Chapter One: [iurl=#one][b]Introduction[/b][/iurl] Chapter Two: [iurl=#two][b]Goals[/b][/iurl] Chapter Three: [iurl=#three][b]Progress[/b][/iurl] Chapter Four: [iurl=#four][b]Contacting Me[/b][/iurl] Chapter Five: [iurl=#five][b]Tutor Me[/b][/iurl]
[center][size=24pt][anchor=one]Chapter One:[/anchor][/size][/center] [center][size=18pt][u]Introduction[/u][/size][/center] Well, I posted recruits for project un named, both here and on rune-server.net and I have decided to cancel it due to a lack of interest. But all hope is not lost for me, I am still going to persue the goals of this team solo, even if I don't have the expierience or knowledge to do it, which I don't, I will learn along the way and I will figure things out. I am going to read some tutorials then get started editing both the server and client. I could use a "tutor" though, I can do some nooby stuff with the server, most compilcated thing I can do really is add some basic booleans and voids :-\, but I am almost completly inexpierienced with the client side of things. Nonetheless, I will strive for perfection of my goals, which I will be discussing in a little bit. But I will frequently update this topic as I make advancements in this project. My goal is to have the server and client 100% done by January 1st, 2009. I started this on New Years Day, 2008, so it gives me a full year to work on it, and I totally think I can do it with some help.
[center][size=24pt][anchor=two]Chapter Two:[/anchor][/size][/center] [center][size=18pt][u]Goals[/u][/size][/center] I have set my goals high, but I think with enough time and effort, I can reach them, and maybe become well known as a good programmer. But here are a list of my goals: I will be adding more when I think of them.
[size=16pt][center][u]KEY[/u][/center] Red = Not Started Yellow = Being worked on Green = Finished
[size=16pt][center][u]SERVER SIDE[/u][/center]
• Full tutorial island • All cities have functions, like real RuneScape • MultiPK and Single Comabt PK zones • Nearly perfect max hit calculator • Full range and mage, with gfx and facing each other • Fire cape game with waves • Full prayer with head icons, drainage based on bonus and not using two of same kind • Fully working offensive and defensive bonuses • 100% fletching • Full mining and smithing • Full firemaking and woodcutting • 90% RC, no combo runes • All skills somehow functional • NPC combat only • Castlewars like minigame • Massing disabled on EVERYTHING, food, objects, items, people, NPCs • Full specs • Some quests • Put on a MySQL database and make a website (completly unexpierienced with)
[u][center]CLIENT SIDE[/u][/center] • Add new items • Custom gameframe • Newest cache • Web client • Custom colored objects
[center][size=24pt][anchor=three]Chapter Three:[/anchor][/size][/center] [center][size=18pt][u]Progress[/u][/size][/center] Official Progress Bar: |||||||||||||||||||| 1% Done
Update List: Found source, Thanks to Yorick from runeserver Found client, Eyrescape, most basic open client I could find.
[center][size=24pt][anchor=four]Chapter Four:[/anchor][/size][/center] [center][size=18pt][u]Contacting Me[/u][/size][/center] If for any reason you would like to contact me, here is my info: AIM ScreenName: Casella32 Email: [email]raidersmmf37@yahoo.com[/email] Or You Could Join My Forums That I Can't Advertise.
[center][size=24pt][anchor=five]Chapter Five:[/anchor][/size][/center] [center][size=18pt][u]Tutoring[/u][/size][/center] What I Currently Need To Know Now: How to set up safe and wild zones and making players able to attack each other
If you took the time to read that long, boring beginning, I thank you. And if you are looking here because you want to help me, then thank you alot. I am not looking for a full time tutor, but rather multiple people that are willing and kind enough to teach me a thing or two. Anyways, like I said before, I know some basic stuff, but I will need to know some hardcore stuff to finish this project going solo. So if you would like to "tutor" me, please sign up with this application: [code]Name: Server/Client: What You Will Teach Me:[/code]
[size=7pt]A Note To The Reader: I put more time and effort into this post than any other I have ever made, and if you are just going to flame or spam me, don't waste your time, or mine.[/size] [size=7pt]Another Note To The Reader: If you read this, please post, I don't want this to die out[/size] [center][iurl=#top][size=6pt][b]Top Of Page[/size][/iurl][/center]

item.title: Simplestic Development

i know, but i want the maxhit to be almost exactly like rs’

Read full topic

item.title: Simplestic Development
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

seems like you got a long way to go, the calculator is easy, all its is +playerMaxHit+. make a code to send the person a message with that in it

Read full topic

item.title: Simplestic Development
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

[anchor=top][/anchor]

[center][size=24pt]Table Of Contents[/size][/center]
Chapter One: [iurl=#one]Introduction[/iurl]
Chapter Two: [iurl=#two]Goals[/iurl]
Chapter Three: [iurl=#three]Progress[/iurl]
Chapter Four: [iurl=#four]Contacting Me[/iurl]
Chapter Five: [iurl=#five]Tutor Me[/iurl]

[center][size=24pt][anchor=one]Chapter One:[/anchor][/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Introduction[/size][/center]
Well, I posted recruits for project un named, both here and on rune-server.net and I have decided to cancel it due to a lack of interest. But all hope is not lost for me, I am still going to persue the goals of this team solo, even if I don’t have the expierience or knowledge to do it, which I don’t, I will learn along the way and I will figure things out. I am going to read some tutorials then get started editing both the server and client. I could use a “tutor” though, I can do some nooby stuff with the server, most compilcated thing I can do really is add some basic booleans and voids :-, but I am almost completly inexpierienced with the client side of things. Nonetheless, I will strive for perfection of my goals, which I will be discussing in a little bit. But I will frequently update this topic as I make advancements in this project. My goal is to have the server and client 100% done by January 1st, 2009. I started this on New Years Day, 2008, so it gives me a full year to work on it, and I totally think I can do it with some help.

[center][size=24pt][anchor=two]Chapter Two:[/anchor][/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Goals[/size][/center]
I have set my goals high, but I think with enough time and effort, I can reach them, and maybe become well known as a good programmer. But here are a list of my goals: I will be adding more when I think of them.

[size=16pt][center]KEY[/center]
Red = Not Started
Yellow = Being worked on
Green = Finished

[size=16pt][center]SERVER SIDE[/center]

• Full tutorial island
• All cities have functions, like real RuneScape
• MultiPK and Single Comabt PK zones
• Nearly perfect max hit calculator
• Full range and mage, with gfx and facing each other
• Fire cape game with waves
• Full prayer with head icons, drainage based on bonus and not using two of same kind
• Fully working offensive and defensive bonuses
• 100% fletching
• Full mining and smithing
• Full firemaking and woodcutting
• 90% RC, no combo runes
• All skills somehow functional
• NPC combat only
• Castlewars like minigame
• Massing disabled on EVERYTHING, food, objects, items, people, NPCs
• Full specs
• Some quests
• Put on a MySQL database and make a website (completly unexpierienced with)

[center]CLIENT SIDE[/center]
• Add new items
• Custom gameframe
• Newest cache
• Web client
• Custom colored objects

[center][size=24pt][anchor=three]Chapter Three:[/anchor][/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Progress[/size][/center]
Official Progress Bar:
||||||||||||||||||||
1% Done

Update List:
Found source, Thanks to Yorick from runeserver
Found client, Eyrescape, most basic open client I could find.

[center][size=24pt][anchor=four]Chapter Four:[/anchor][/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Contacting Me[/size][/center]
If for any reason you would like to contact me, here is my info:
AIM ScreenName: Casella32
Email: raidersmmf37@yahoo.com
Or You Could Join My Forums That I Can’t Advertise.

[center][size=24pt][anchor=five]Chapter Five:[/anchor][/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Tutoring[/size][/center]
What I Currently Need To Know Now: How to set up safe and wild zones and making players able to attack each other

If you took the time to read that long, boring beginning, I thank you. And if you are looking here because you want to help me, then thank you alot. I am not looking for a full time tutor, but rather multiple people that are willing and kind enough to teach me a thing or two. Anyways, like I said before, I know some basic stuff, but I will need to know some hardcore stuff to finish this project going solo. So if you would like to “tutor” me, please sign up with this application:

Name: Server/Client: What You Will Teach Me:

[size=7pt]A Note To The Reader: I put more time and effort into this post than any other I have ever made, and if you are just going to flame or spam me, don’t waste your time, or mine.[/size]
[size=7pt]Another Note To The Reader: If you read this, please post, I don’t want this to die out[/size]
